scripts.atlas:diff: docker compose -f docker-compose.db.yml --env-file ../../.env run --rm atlas schema diff --config file://infra/database/atlas.hcl --env local --from env://url --to file://infra/database/src/schema/
scripts.atlas:migrate:diff: docker compose -f docker-compose.db.yml --env-file ../../.env run --rm atlas migrate diff --config file://infra/database/atlas.hcl --env local
scripts.atlas:migrate:apply: docker compose -f docker-compose.db.yml --env-file ../../.env run --rm atlas migrate apply --config file://infra/database/atlas.hcl --env local
scripts.atlas:migrate:status: docker compose -f docker-compose.db.yml --env-file ../../.env run --rm atlas migrate status --config file://infra/database/atlas.hcl --env local
scripts.atlas:inspect: docker compose -f docker-compose.db.yml --env-file ../../.env run --rm atlas schema inspect --config file://infra/database/atlas.hcl --env local
